entry.title: Re There's currently 3 badges on @Sismo_eth and developers can build any privacy respecting badges they like using their zk-Proof technology. So expec...
entry.summary: Re There's currently 3 badges on @Sismo_eth and developers can build any privacy respecting badges they like using their zk-Proof technology. So expect more to come but in the meantime you can do these 3 here: https://alpha.sismo.io/

entry.title: Re Step 4: Mint the Proof-of-Humanity badge to the "destination" wallet. This NFT badge proves you're a human and a project could require its users to...
entry.summary: Re Step 4: Mint the Proof-of-Humanity badge to the "destination" wallet. This NFT badge proves you're a human and a project could require its users to have such a badge in order to be eligible for an airdrop. There's no way to trace a badge back to its "source" account.

entry.title: Re Step 3: Select a "destination" wallet. This is the wallet which you actually use, with your assets and transaction data but which you don't want to...
entry.summary: Re Step 3: Select a "destination" wallet. This is the wallet which you actually use, with your assets and transaction data but which you don't want to dox. Switch wallet and then sign a new message with it to prove you own that wallet as well.

entry.title: Re Step 2: Go to Sign a message to prove you have ownership over this wallet containing the proof-of-humanity profile.
entry.summary: Re Step 2: Go to Sign a message to prove you have ownership over this wallet containing the proof-of-humanity profile. https://alpha.sismo.io/proof-of-humanity

entry.title: Re Step 1: Create a @proofofhumanity profile with a fresh wallet ( requires uploading a video, in which you show a sign & speak) Once you tie your PoH...
entry.summary: Re Step 1: Create a @proofofhumanity profile with a fresh wallet ( requires uploading a video, in which you show a sign & speak) Once you tie your PoH profile to that wallet, the wallet is doxxed. But you don't care, you're never going to use it. https://www.proofofhumanity.id/

entry.title: Re Not unlikely that future big airdrops will require such a "uniqueness" check to avoid the same people "farming" an airdrop with multiple addresses ...
entry.summary: Re Not unlikely that future big airdrops will require such a "uniqueness" check to avoid the same people "farming" an airdrop with multiple addresses (e.g deposit $10 in a vault with 100 addresses). So how to prove uniqueness?

entry.title: Re For example, prove you have > 100 $ETH in your wallet w/o disclosing the wallet address. Prove you own a @cryptopunksnfts without showing which pun...
entry.summary: Re For example, prove you have > 100 $ETH in your wallet w/o disclosing the wallet address. Prove you own a @cryptopunksnfts without showing which punk. Prove you are a unique human who did a @proofofhumanity check without disclosing your name + video.

entry.title: Re Enter @Sismo_eth which is building an attestation protocol using zk-Proofs allowing anyone to prove facts about themselves without going into the s...
entry.summary: Re Enter @Sismo_eth which is building an attestation protocol using zk-Proofs allowing anyone to prove facts about themselves without going into the specifics. Sismo 🎭: The long awaited Proof of Humanity ZK Badge is now available on Sismo 💜 Transfer your @proofofhumanity from your doxxed address to an address of your choice, in total privacy! 👉 A new primitive for web3 to fight Sybil! 🎭 https://alpha.sismo.io/proof-of-humanity

entry.title: Many argue that identity is the next important building block in Web3. Fact is airdrops in today's state are so heavily gamed, they're almost broken. ...
entry.summary: Many argue that identity is the next important building block in Web3. Fact is airdrops in today's state are so heavily gamed, they're almost broken. What if you could prove your uniqueness to a Dapp without actually disclosing your ID data? Sismo 🎭: We open-sourced the Sismo protocol and its first ZK Attester. Sismo is a modular Attestations Protocol. It hosts diverse attestations focused on privacy and decentralization. Anyone is welcome to build with us. Sismo 101: Attestations as Web3 Cookies! (Links end of 🧵)
